title: Chapter 382 - Enemies On All Sides, One-Sided Suppression
body:
Chapter 382 - Enemies On All Sides, One-Sided Suppression

Boom!

The elder Chu Xiu called Ol' Yun was the first to attack. His gaunt frame shockingly expanded to a full fifty feet tall.

Dense black scales formed on his skin, and his eyes turned bright red, while a pair of curved, snow-white tusks jutted from the corners of his mouth. 

Gusts of fiery, explosive yao qi emanated from his massive frame. This was the imposing might of the Origin Palace Realm, and it was fierce beyond limit.

“This…”

Qin Dongxu and the others felt their hair stand on end, and they suddenly found it hard to breathe.

The elder’s aura was cruel and ferocious. He was far more terrifying than A’Lin or the young man in purple!

Churning black yao flames spread around his towering, fifty-foot frame at speeds visible to the naked eye, as if he were a barbarian god.

Su Yi was just on the verge of running out of patience, but when he saw this, he couldn’t help but arch his brow. A Firedemon Spirit Macaque! 

This was a variant species with almost limitless strength. The power of their bloodline was domineering, as they possessed innate control over fire!

Boom!

The elder took a big step forward. Despite his enormous size, he was as nimble as fire or lightning. Before even drawing near, he swung his fist at Su Yi.

The air descended into chaos...
original_title: Chapter 382 - Enemies On All Sides, One-Sided Suppression
